sentences.en: The crowd began chanting anti-government slogans.
sentences.cn: 人群开始反复高呼反政府口号。

sentences.en: Ministers are worried by this current of anti-government feeling.
sentences.cn: 部长们对这股反政府情绪感到担忧。

sentences.en: Mr. Cramer said the violence by anti-government protestors was reprehensible.
sentences.cn: 克拉默先生说反政府示威者们的暴力行为应受到谴责。
